summary: This document is a brief email correspondence from Richard Kahn, indicating a willingness to revisit discussions regarding new accounts in the following month. The tone is casual and confirms receipt of a previous message.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is the sender of the email, responding to a previous inquiry about new accounts.

keyFacts: The email was sent on July 26, 2019.
Richard Kahn expresses a willingness to revisit discussions about new accounts next month.
The correspondence is marked as confidential.
